metadata.Title: CVE-2020-14039 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: In Go before 1.13.13 and 1.14.x before 1.14.5, Certificate.Verify may lack a check on the VerifyOptions.KeyUsages EKU requirements (if VerifyOptions.Roots equals nil and the installation is on Windows). Thus, X.509 certificate verification is incomplete.

notes.Note: mdeslaur> Packages built using golang need to be rebuilt once the vulnerability has been fixed. This CVE entry does not list packages that need rebuilding outside of the main repository or the Ubuntu variants with PPA overlays.  This is a windows-specific issue, Ubuntu is not affected

criterions.comment: golang: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
golang-1.6: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
